notFoundPage.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFoundPage.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

name: Name
landingPage.description: Share farming knowledge, get advice on crop diseases, and build a community of sustainable agriculture.
readyToJoin: Ready to join our farming community?
connectDescription: Connect with farmers, share knowledge, and grow together.

expertCommunity.title: Expert Community
expertCommunity.description: Connect with experienced farmers who can help with specific crop varieties and regional growing techniques.

diseaseIdentification.title: Disease Identification
diseaseIdentification.description: Upload photos of plant issues and get quick identification and treatment advice from specialists.

localConnections.title: Local Connections
localConnections.description: Find farmers in your area with similar growing conditions and build a supportive local network.

testimonial.quote: This platform has transformed how our farming community shares knowledge. I found experts who helped me solve a persistent crop disease issue within days!
testimonial.author: Maria Rodriguez

auth.enterEmail: Enter your email below to login to your account
auth.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth.enterDetails: Enter your details below to register your account
auth.clickOnMap: Click anywhere on the map to select your address
auth.selectedCoordinates: Selected coordinates will be used as your farm location
auth.pleaseSelectAddress: Please select an address on the map

map.findUsersWithExpertise: Find users with specific expertise levels in particular crops
map.invalidAddressFormats: Some users have invalid address formats
map.invalidAddressExplanation: The following users couldn't be displayed on the map because their addresses aren't in the expected "latitude,longitude" format:
map.invalidAddressWarning: Some users have invalid address formats
map.distanceFilterWarning: Cannot enable distance filter: Your location is not set.
map.loginToContact: Please login to contact other users

dashboard.title: Smart Farming Dashboard
dashboard.uploadDescription: Upload a photo of your plant to identify potential diseases
dashboard.locationNotAvailable: Location not available. Some features may be limited.
dashboard.clickToUpload: Click to upload a plant image
dashboard.noPlantTypes: No plant types found. Please add plants in your profile.
dashboard.alertsDescription: Alerts from farmers within 100km with similar crops
dashboard.noAlerts: No disease alerts in your area
dashboard.stayVigilant: Stay vigilant and report any diseases you detect to help other farmers in your region.
dashboard.noAlertsMessage: You don't have any recent alerts. When disease alerts are generated, they will appear here.
dashboard.noCulturesMessage: You haven't added any cultures yet. Add cultures in your profile to track them here.

profile.title: My Farmer Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your profile, cultures, and view performance statistics

cultures.title: Culture Types & Experience
cultures.selectDescription: Select from existing culture types or add your own.
cultures.customCultureNote: Your custom culture will be added to the available types
cultures.noCultures: You haven't added any culture types yet.
cultures.addCulturesNote: Add cultures to track your farming experience.

history.title: Culture History
history.recordDescription: Record a new culture cycle with yield information.
history.yieldNote: Enter 0 for ongoing or failed cultures
history.startAddingNote: Start adding your culture cycles to track performance.
history.updateDescription: Update the details of this culture cycle.

statistics.title: Farming Performance Overview
statistics.description: Track your agricultural performance across different cultures and seasons. These insights help you make data-driven farming decisions.
statistics.yieldDescription: Average yield for each culture (in kg)
statistics.completeNote: Complete culture cycles to see yield statistics
statistics.harvestDescription: Number of harvests by culture type
statistics.successRateDescription: Success rate percentage by culture type
statistics.completeMoreNote: Complete more culture cycles to view success rates

chatPage.chooseUser: Choose a user from the sidebar to start chatting
chatPage.startConversation: Start the conversation by sending a message

conversationList.selectUser: Select a user below to start chatting
